segments.text: Could you introduce some whitening products for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please forgive me just being frankly , madam . You don't need whitening products because you look pretty white . But you have freckles on your face .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then what kind of product can fade freckles ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I recommend Nisei products . This brand has a face cream which is effective on fading freckles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is too expensive for me . Do you have something cheaper ?
segments.speaker: S1
